header.gameNote: WEST COAST CONFERENCE MEN'S TOURNAMENT - QUARTERFINAL

article.description: Colbey Ross had 26 points as Pepperdine topped San Francisco 89-72 in the quarterfinals of the West Coast Conference Tourney on Saturday night.
article.headline: Ross scores 26 to lift Pepperdine over San Francisco 89-72
article.linkText: Ross scores 26 to lift Pepperdine over San Francisco 89-72
article.story: LAS VEGAS -- Colbey Ross had 26 points as Pepperdine topped San Francisco 89-72 in the quarterfinals of the West Coast Conference Tourney on Saturday night. Kessler Edwards had 14 points and seven rebounds for Pepperdine (16-17). Eric Cooper Jr. added 13 points. Darnell Dunn had 12 points and seven rebounds for Pepperdine. Charles Minlend had 17 points for the Dons (21-10). Frankie Ferrari added 12 points. Matt McCarthy had eight rebounds. --- For more AP college basketball coverage: https://apnews.com/Collegebasketball and http://twitter.com/AP-Top25 --- This was generated by Automated Insights, http://www.automatedinsights.com/ap , using data from STATS LLC, https://www.stats.com
